Customer Experience & Sales Executive Job at Theshopthera




        
    

        
        Theshopthera is into sales of mobile phone accessories offline and online, and they are recruiting an experienced, passionate and creative individual to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Experience & Sales Executive

Job Location: Wuse, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are looking for a smart, organized and customer-driven individual to join our team. If you love talking to people, closing sales and keeping things running smoothly, then this role is for you.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Respond to walk-in & online customers inquiries, messages & complaints quickly, clearly & professionally.

	Package orders neatly, ensure accurate order fufilment and folllow up till customer satisfaction.

Requirements

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Brand & Digital Marketing Strategist",
  "description": "At Treendit, we believe in the power of captivating narratives, visually stunning designs, and strategic digital prowess. As a dynamic digital marketing and creative agency, our mission is to elevate your brand to new heights, delivering unparalleled results in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand &amp; Digital Marketing Strategist
Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	As a Brand &amp; Digital Marketing Strategist, you&rsquo;ll act as a lead strategist and client representative within Treendit.
	You&rsquo;ll oversee multiple brands, develop integrated marketing strategies, and collaborate with creative and product teams to execute campaigns that elevate visibility, engagement, and growth.
	This is a role for a thinker-doer someone who combines brand storytelling with digital strategy, creativity with analytics, and strategic planning with hands-on execution.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and manage brand and marketing strategies for multiple client accounts.
	Lead campaign ideation, execution, and reporting, from strategy decks to launch to optimization.
	Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and audience insights for each client.
	Manage clients&rsquo; digital presence across social media, web, and paid media.
	Collaborate with Treendit&rsquo;s creative team to produce on-brand, high-impact content.
	Develop and monitor KPIs for each campaign; optimize based on performance analytics.
	Serve as the primary marketing contact for assigned clients, ensuring satisfaction, consistency, and strategic alignment.
	Stay current on trends in branding, content, social platforms, and digital tools to inform strategy.


Qualifications


	1.5+ years of proven experience in brand strategy, digital marketing, or agency account management.
	Demonstrated success managing multiple client brands or campaigns simultaneously.
	Solid understanding of marketing funnels, social media management, and content strategy.
	Proficiency with tools like Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics, Canva, Mailchimp, and Notion (or similar).
	Very good storytelling, presentation, and client communication skills.
	Ability to think strategically while executing with precision and creativity.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Portfolio to:&nbsp;sabdat@treendit.com&nbsp;using &quot;Brand &amp; Digital Marketing Strategist&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

Brand & Digital Marketing Strategist Job at Treendit




        
    

        
        At Treendit, we believe in the power of captivating narratives, visually stunning designs, and strategic digital prowess. As a dynamic digital marketing and creative agency, our mission is to elevate your brand to new heights, delivering unparalleled results in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand & Digital Marketing Strategist
Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

            
    




	As a Brand & Digital Marketing Strategist, you’ll act as a lead strategist and client representative within Treendit.
	You’ll oversee multiple brands, develop integrated marketing strategies, and collaborate with creative and product teams to execute campaigns that elevate visibility, engagement, and growth.
	This is a role for a thinker-doer someone who combines brand storytelling with digital strategy, creativity with analytics, and strategic planning with hands-on execution.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and manage brand and marketing strategies for multiple client accounts.
	Lead campaign ideation, execution, and reporting, from strategy decks to launch to optimization.
	Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and audience insights for each client.
	Manage clients’ digital presence across social media, web, and paid media.
	Collaborate with Treendit’s creative team to produce on-brand, high-impact content.
	Develop and monitor KPIs for each campaign; optimize based on performance analytics.
	Serve as the primary marketing contact for assigned clients, ensuring satisfaction, consistency, and strategic alignment.
	Stay current on trends in branding, content, social platforms, and digital tools to inform strategy.


Qualifications


	1.5+ years of proven experience in brand strategy, digital marketing, or agency account management.
	Demonstrated success managing multiple client brands or campaigns simultaneously.
	Solid understanding of marketing funnels, social media management, and content strategy.
	Proficiency with tools like Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics, Canva, Mailchimp, and Notion (or similar).
	Very good storytelling, presentation, and client communication skills.
	Ability to think strategically while executing with precision and creativity.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Portfolio to: sabdat@treendit.com using "Brand & Digital Marketing Strategist" as the subject of the mail.
